mapper.select: select phone,name from electricity_bill join user on electricity_bill.user_id = user.id where status = #{code}

select name, eb.time,eb.price,eb.summation,eb.cost,eb.status, em.previous_reading,em.reading, b.building_num,b.floor,b.doorplate from electricity_bill eb join user on eb.user_id = user.id join building b on b.id = eb.building_id join electricity_meter em on eb.electricity_meter_id = em.id where eb.time BETWEEN #{startOfMonth} AND #{endOfMonth} order by eb.time desc,b.id

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m') AS time, SUM(summation) AS num, ROUND(AVG(summation)) AS avg_num # avg_num平均数，取整 FROM electricity_bill WHERE time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY time
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m') AS time, SUM(cost) AS num, ROUND(AVG(cost)) AS avg_num FROM electricity_bill WHERE time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY time
SELECT status as name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM electricity_bill WHERE time BETWEEN #{firstDayOfLastMonth} AND #{lastDayOfLastMonth} AND status != 2 -- 排除status为1的记录,即退款的 GROUP BY name ORDER BY name
